feed.title: Docker Volume Backup Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.43.0
New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.43.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Error cases when parsing labeled commands into argv are not handled sufficiently #506

Chores

  • Dependency hygiene #460 #461 #463 #464 #467 #469 #470 #475 #476 #477 #479 #482 #483 #485 #487 #489 #488 #491 #493 #494 #495 #499 #501 #500 #508 #510 #511 #512 #516 #518 #517
  • Compile using Go 1.23 #462
  • Base image off alpine:3.21 #502

Docs

  • Documentation update for DROPBOX_REMOTE_PATH environment variable #473 (thanks @shalafi99)

entry.title: New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.43.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Support passing standard ssh keys to age encryption #530

Chores

  • Dependency Hygiene #522 #523 #524 #526 #527
  • Docker build now warns about casing mismatch 2652e051694df32ce7613d38146c16d4c0420495

entry.title: New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.43.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Directories aren't excluded from pruning logic #548

Chores

  • Dependency hygiene #532 #533 #534 #535 #536 #542 #543 #544 #545
  • Build using Go 1.24 #537
  • Always use read only socket mount in tests #546

Docs

  • Config reference should always use default values #549

entry.title: New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.43.4
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fall back to default behavior when deployed to a Swarm worker node #593

Docs

  • Link to Dropbox from config reference is outdated #562
  • Update encrypt-backups.md #550 (Thanks @danial23)

Chores

  • Dependency hygiene #551 #553 #554 #555 #556 #557 #558 #559 #560 #568 #569 #570 #572 #573 #577 #579 #580 #583 #584 #585 #586 #587
  • Update base image #589
